translation: Arjuna said, "O mighty-armed Hrishikesa, I desire to know the essence or truth of renunciation and abandonment severally, O slayer of Kesi."
commentary: 18.1 of renunciation of renunciation? Mighty-armed O mightyarmed? Tattvam the essence of truth? I wish (I) wish? veditum to know? Tyagasya of Tyaga or abandonment? f and? Hrishikesh: O Krishna? Separately severally? Keshinishudan slayer of Kesi.Commentary The teaching of the whole of the GitaSastra is summed up beautifully in this discourse.
